FDG.function_description: Period tracking & women’s health social community

FDG.function_description: The page functions as a search interface within a period tracking and women’s health social community app, allowing users to input queries, view search history, explore suggested searches, and browse trending health - related topics.

steps.summary: Click the search icon to open the search page
Input a query in the search field
Click a suggested query to view its search results

FDG.function_description: This page enables users to create and publish a new post (with a minimum text length of 8 characters) in a women’s health social community, offering options to add hashtags, emojis, images, and other elements, as well as access to drafts and templates.

core_logic.logic: To create a new post, start by clicking the 'Post new content' button. Then, input the post content (minimum 8 characters) in the text field. After that, you can choose to add a hashtag by clicking a hashtag suggestion, or cancel the post creation. The flow includes optional steps for adding elements like hashtags or canceling.

steps.summary: Click to start creating a new post
Input post content (at least 8 characters)
Click to cancel post creation
Click a hashtag suggestion to add it to the post

branches.condition: User wants to cancel post creation
User wants to add a hashtag (or other optional elements)
